title: Danny's Love Letters
description: Daniel Warner's debut novel that focuses on the story of an aspiring screenwriter Daniel Bruckheimer, who comes to New York City to reunite with an old friend, find lost love and hopefully sell his first work. Sounds simple enough, doesn't it? Only his old friend is not particularly thrilled to see him, nor does it look like his script is going to be sold. And when it comes to love, well, Danny Bruckheimer could never get that part right...
author: Daniel  Warner
